geometry.r_values: List of radius of curvature values for ROC bends (µm)
geometry.L: Total target length of the path (µm)
geometry.x: Length of straight sections at ends (µm)

text.offset_left: Horizontal offset for left text label (µm)
text.offset_right: Horizontal offset for right text label (µm)

taper.length: Length of tapers connecting to grating couplers (µm)

grating_coupler.type: Type of grating coupler component to use
grating_coupler.fill_factor: Filling factor of the grating teeth (0.0-1.0)
grating_coupler.taper_length: Length of the taper section in the grating coupler (µm)
grating_coupler.wavelength: Design wavelength for the grating coupler (µm)
grating_coupler.fiber_angle: Angle of the optical fiber relative to normal (degrees)
grating_coupler.width: Width of the grating coupler waveguide (µm)

array.spacing: Spacing between devices in the array (µm)
